title: Soap Lemon Verbena 8 oz Bar(s) by South of France
description: Front label panel: SOUTH OF FRANCE Ultra Shea & Moisturizing Mango Butter Mango 8.8 oz. (250g) Instructions: Use as you would any other fine soap. Ingredients: 100% vegetable oils: palm olive and/or coconut oil shea butter mango butter mineral pigment or vegetable color natural fragrance and/or essential oils. Supplemental Facts: * Not tested on animals * Biodegradable and recyclable packaging

title: Revlon - Revlon Matte Lipstick , Really RED 006
description: Revlon Super Lustrous Lipstick82 SHADES in 4 FABULOUS FINISHES Infused with mega-moisturizers to seal in color and softness. Find your lip color amongst a dazzling array of 82 shade in 4 fabulous finishes of Matte, Pearl, Creme and Shine.- Exclusive LiquiSilk formula with mega-moisturizers seals in color and softness - Silky-smooth, creamy texture - Stay true color wears evenly Apply directly to lips for a high-shine look. Add Revlon Super Lustrous Lip Gloss for even more shine.

title: The Body Shop Body Butter, Satsuma, 6.75 Ounce
description: This rich and creamy Body Butter is a feast for the skin. It melts straight in to leave skin feeling soft and smooth. It contains Community Fair Trade shea butter and smells of fresh satsuma. 24-hour hydration great for normal to dry skin -- Fresh satsuma scent.
